attributes.action: Award Captain Tom Moore a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: This is being requested via petition as the normal honours process takes 12-18 months. Captain Tom Moore turns 100 on the 30th April 2020. It is in both his interests and the interests of the country (to raise morale as we recuperate from this pandemic) for this process to be expedited.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore is a 99 year old war hero who has selflessly come to the aid of this country once more, raising millions of pounds for the NHS during the COVID-19 pandemic. He epitomises the British spirit and deserves to be recognised for his dedication.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
